com.isomorphic.jpa
Class JPADataSource.ConnectionHolder

java.lang.Object
  com.isomorphic.jpa.JPADataSource.ConnectionHolder
Enclosing class:
JPADataSource
public class JPADataSource.ConnectionHolder
extends java.lang.Object

Holds EntityManager and current transaction. Instance of this class is used to store connection information in RPCManager while handling Automatic Transactions.

Constructor Summary
JPADataSource.ConnectionHolder(javax.persistence.EntityManager em, java.lang.Object tx)
          Creates new connection holder with specified EntityManager and transaction.
 
Method Summary
 javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
          Returns EntityManager for this connection.

          Returns count of operations executed.

          Returns current open transaction.
 void increaseOpCount()
          Increases operations count by 1.

          Sets new EntityManager.
 void setOpCount(int opCount)
          Sets count of operations.

          Sets new transaction.
 

Constructor Detail

JPADataSource.ConnectionHolder

public JPADataSource.ConnectionHolder(javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                                      java.lang.Object tx)
Creates new connection holder with specified EntityManager and transaction. Operation counter is set to 0.

Parameters:
em - EntityManager current entity manager.
tx - Object current open transaction.
